payload.description: Create backend/services/course_service.py. Methods: create_course(user_id, org_id, title, description, intro_content), publish_course(course_id, user_id) [auto-creates badge with type 'course_completion', populates badge_quests from course_quests], enroll_student(course_id, user_id) [creates enrollment + auto-enrolls in course quests], get_student_progress(course_id, user_id) [calculates XP earned / total XP from course quests], add_quest_to_course(), remove_quest_from_course(), reorder_quests(). Use CourseRepository.
payload.context: Reference backend/services/badge_service.py and backend/services/quest_service.py for patterns. publish_course must: 1) create badge with badge_type='course_completion', 2) calculate min_quests and min_xp from course quests, 3) populate badge_quests table. enroll_student must call existing quest enrollment for each course quest.
